pages.text: $(li)Striders are passive creatures that can be found walking over the lava of the Nether.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/string)Strings$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)They can be bred by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/warped_fungus)Warped Fungus$(/l).$(br)$(li)Striders can be equipped with a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l).
Then you can ride this Strider right clicking on it and drive it with a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/warped_fungus_on_a_stick)Warped Fungus on a Stick$(/l).
